pr_title: feat: include API response headers in 'Last Response'

timeline.message:
feat: include API response headers in 'Last Response'

The default HTTP client stores 'Last Request' and 'Last Response' information for access to more data about the raw API request/response. The response object did not contain the headers until now.

timeline.bodyText: Where's the definition for getAllHeaders? I only see getHeaders
timeline.author: eshanholtz

replies.bodyText: Then what's the benefit of the getHeaders function?
replies.author: eshanholtz

replies.bodyText: getHeaders requires a string argument for getting specific headers.
replies.author: childish-sambino

replies.bodyText: I don't see it taking in any arguments
replies.author: eshanholtz
